Address: 702 W. Dallas Phone:... Image 28 of 28 Texans who? Where to watch the Astros 1 / 28 Back to Gallery It sure was swell of the Houston Astros to take our minds off how miserable the Texans looked on Sunday.
Now, the Astros are headed to Yankee Stadium to take on New York in a single-game winner take's all affair.
The American League Wild Card Game gets underway at 7 p.m. and airs on ESPN.
The Astros haven't played a post-season game since 2005 and that's more than reason enough to cheer.
Browse the slideshow above to see recommended sports bars for viewing the big game.
